guide.introduction: Its very simple. A sugary syrup is made, then starts to crystalize on a "base" crystal. Pretty soon... CANDY!
guide.introduction_rendered:
Its very simple. A sugary syrup is made, then starts to crystalize on a "base" crystal. Pretty soon... CANDY!

Relevant parts
  • wood skewer
  • Glass jar
  • Sugar

lines.text: 1.  Mix 2 cups water with 4 cups sugar in a pan.
lines.text_raw: 1.  Mix 2 cups water with 4 cups sugar in a pan.

lines.text: Bring to a simmer, stirring constanly. (You may add food coloring.)
lines.text_raw: Bring to a simmer, stirring constanly. (You may add food coloring.)

lines.text: Now take a wood skewer, wet it, roll it in sugar and let dry.
lines.text_raw: Now take a wood skewer, wet it, roll it in sugar and let dry.

lines.text: Pour sugar syrup from last step in a jar.
lines.text_raw: Pour sugar syrup from last step in a jar.

lines.text: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Shine until tomorrow...
lines.text_raw: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Shine until tomorrow...

lines.text: As the Beatles just stated, let it be for a while.
